sentences.en: Indeed, if many investors abjure the listing , those who hold their noses and take the plunge might make even more money.
sentences.cn: 当然, 如果许多投资人放弃购买该公司的股份, 那些铤而走险的人也许真的会赚更多的钱.

sentences.en: Some of the Roman Emperors tried to make Christians abjure their religion.
sentences.cn: 有些罗马皇帝试著使基督教徒宣誓放弃他们的宗教.

sentences.en: The conqueror tried to make the natives abjure their religion.
sentences.cn: 征服者试著让当地人宣誓放弃他们的宗教.

sentences.en: They were compelled to abjure their faith.
sentences.cn: 他们被迫发誓放弃自己的信仰.

words.tran_cn: 发誓放弃；公开放弃；避免

trans.tran_cn: 发誓放弃, 避免, 公开放弃
trans.tran_en: to state publicly that you will give up a particular belief or way of behaving

trans.tran_cn: 发誓放弃，郑重放弃（意见），宣布撤回（声明等），避免
trans.tran_en: If you abjure something such as a belief or way of life, you state publicly that you will give it up or that you reject it
